english:
This document appears to be a fiscal note for HB796 (Texas Sovereignty Act) that only addresses the financial implications of the bill for state and local government. Fiscal notes are technical documents that analyze the budgetary and cost implications of proposed legislation, rather than describing the actual policy content or substantive changes of the bills.

Without access to the actual bill text and content of HB796, I cannot make any meaningful assessment of:
- Potential impacts on immigrants or specific ethnic groups
- Effects on Chinese nationals or Chinese Americans
- Policy changes or regulations being proposed
- Discriminatory aspects, if any exist

The fiscal note simply indicates there would be no significant financial impact to state or local government from implementing this legislation. To properly analyze impacts on any demographic groups, the full bill text would be needed.
chinese:
这份文件是针对HB796号法案（德克萨斯主权法案）的财政说明，仅涉及该法案对州和地方政府财政影响的分析。财政说明是分析提议立法的预算和成本影响的技术性文件，而不是描述法案的实际政策内容或实质性变化。

由于无法获取HB796的实际法案文本和内容，我无法对以下方面做出任何有意义的评估：
- 对移民或特定族裔群体的潜在影响
- 对中国公民或美籍华人的影响
- 拟议的政策变更或规定
- 是否存在任何歧视性内容

该财政说明仅表明实施该法案不会对州和地方政府造成重大财政影响。要适当分析对任何人口群体的影响，需要查看完整的法案文本。
